00242 // Macro for combining two vector of 2 elements into one vector of
00243 // 4 elements.
00244 #define AKSIMD_COMBINE_V2F32( a, b ) vcombine_f32( a, b )
00245 
00246 // Macro for shuffle parameter for AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_V4F32() (see _MM_SHUFFLE)
00247 #define AKSIMD_SHUFFLE( fp3, fp2, fp1, fp0 ) \
00248     (((fp3) << 6) | ((fp2) << 4) | ((fp1) << 2) | ((fp0)))
00249 
00252 // Usage: AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_V4F32( vec1, vec2, AKSIMD_SHUFFLE( z, y, x, w ) )
00253 // If you get a link error, it's probably because the required
00254 // _AKSIMD_LOCAL::SHUFFLE_V4F32< zyxw > is not implemented in
00255 // <AK/SoundEngine/Platforms/arm_neon/AkSimdShuffle.h>.
00256 #define AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_V4F32( a, b, zyxw ) \
00257     _AKSIMD_LOCAL::SHUFFLE_V4F32< zyxw >( a, b )
00258 
00259 // Various combinations of zyxw for _AKSIMD_LOCAL::SHUFFLE_V4F32< zyxw > are
00260 // implemented in a separate header file to keep this one cleaner:
00261 #include <AK/SoundEngine/Platforms/arm_neon/AkSimdShuffle.h>
00262 
00268 inline AKSIMD_V4F32 AKSIMD_MOVEHL_V4F32( const AKSIMD_V4F32 abcd, const AKSIMD_V4F32 xyzw ) 
00269 {
00270         //return akshuffle_zwcd( xyzw, abcd );
00271         AKSIMD_V2F32 zw = vget_high_f32( xyzw );
00272         AKSIMD_V2F32 cd = vget_high_f32( abcd );
00273         AKSIMD_V4F32 zwcd = vcombine_f32( zw , cd );
00274         return zwcd;
00275 }
00276 
00282 inline AKSIMD_V4F32 AKSIMD_MOVELH_V4F32( const AKSIMD_V4F32& xyzw, const AKSIMD_V4F32& abcd )
00283 {
00284     return vcombine_f32( vget_low_f32( xyzw ) , vget_low_f32( abcd ) );
00285 }

00288 //#define AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_BADC( __a__ ) AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_V4F32( (__a__), (__a__), AKSIMD_SHUFFLE(2,3,0,1))
00289 #define AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_BADC( __a__ ) vrev64q_f32( __a__ )
00290 
00292 //#define AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_CDAB( __a__ ) AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_V4F32( (__a__), (__a__), AKSIMD_SHUFFLE(1,0,3,2))
00293 #define AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_CDAB( __a__ ) vcombine_f32( vget_high_f32(__a__), vget_low_f32(__a__) )
00294 
00296 #define AKSIMD_DUP_ODD(__vv) AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_V4F32(__vv, __vv, AKSIMD_SHUFFLE(3,3,1,1))
00297 
00299 #define AKSIMD_DUP_EVEN(__vv) AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_V4F32(__vv, __vv, AKSIMD_SHUFFLE(2,2,0,0))

00357 AkForceInline AKSIMD_V4F32 AKSIMD_DIV_V4F32( AKSIMD_V4F32 a, AKSIMD_V4F32 b ) 
00358 {
00359     AKSIMD_V4F32 inv = vrecpeq_f32(b);
00360     AKSIMD_V4F32 restep = vrecpsq_f32(b, inv);
00361     inv = vmulq_f32(restep, inv);
00362     return vmulq_f32(a, inv);
00363 }
00364

00402 AkForceInline AKSIMD_V4F32 AKSIMD_MADD_SS_V4F32( const AKSIMD_V4F32& __a__, const AKSIMD_V4F32& __b__, const AKSIMD_V4F32& __c__ )
00403 {
00404     return AKSIMD_ADD_SS_V4F32( AKSIMD_MUL_SS_V4F32( __a__, __b__ ), __c__ );

00440 static AkForceInline void AKSIMD_HORIZONTALADD( AKSIMD_V4F32 & vVec )
00441 {   
00442     AKSIMD_V4F32 vHighLow = AKSIMD_MOVEHL_V4F32(vVec, vVec);
00443     vVec = AKSIMD_ADD_V4F32(vVec, vHighLow);
00444     vHighLow = AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_V4F32(vVec, vVec, 0x55);
00445     vVec = AKSIMD_ADD_V4F32(vVec, vHighLow);
00446 } 
00447 
00449 
00450 #if defined(AK_IOS) || defined(AK_VITA)
00451 
00452 // V2 implementation (faster 'cause ARM processors actually have an x2 pipeline)
00453 
00454 static AkForceInline AKSIMD_V4F32 AKSIMD_COMPLEXMUL( AKSIMD_V4F32 vCIn1, AKSIMD_V4F32 vCIn2 )
00455 {
00456     static const AKSIMD_V2F32 vSign = { -1.f, 1.f }; 
00457 
00458     AKSIMD_V2F32 vCIn1a = vget_low_f32( vCIn1 );
00459     AKSIMD_V2F32 vCIn2a = vget_low_f32( vCIn2 );
00460     AKSIMD_V2F32 vTmpa0 = vmul_n_f32( vCIn2a, vCIn1a[0] );
00461     AKSIMD_V2F32 vTmpa1 = vmul_n_f32( vCIn2a, vCIn1a[1] );
00462     vTmpa1 = vrev64_f32( vTmpa1 );
00463     vTmpa1 = vmul_f32( vTmpa1, vSign );
00464     vTmpa0 = vadd_f32( vTmpa0, vTmpa1 );
00465 
00466     AKSIMD_V2F32 vCIn1b = vget_high_f32( vCIn1 );
00467     AKSIMD_V2F32 vCIn2b = vget_high_f32( vCIn2 );
00468     AKSIMD_V2F32 vTmpb0 = vmul_n_f32( vCIn2b, vCIn1b[0] );
00469     AKSIMD_V2F32 vTmpb1 = vmul_n_f32( vCIn2b, vCIn1b[1] );
00470     vTmpb1 = vrev64_f32( vTmpb1 );
00471     vTmpb1 = vmul_f32( vTmpb1, vSign );
00472     vTmpb0 = vadd_f32( vTmpb0, vTmpb1 );
00473 
00474     return vcombine_f32( vTmpa0, vTmpb0 );
00475 }
00476 
00477 #else
00478 
00479 // V4 implementation (kept in case future ARM processors actually have an x4 pipeline)
00480 
00481 static AkForceInline AKSIMD_V4F32 AKSIMD_COMPLEXMUL( AKSIMD_V4F32 vCIn1, AKSIMD_V4F32 vCIn2 )
00482 {
00483 #ifdef AKSIMD_DECLARE_V4F32
00484     static const AKSIMD_DECLARE_V4F32( vSign, 1.f, -1.f, 1.f, -1.f ); 
00485 #else
00486     static const AKSIMD_V4F32 vSign = { 1.f, -1.f, 1.f, -1.f }; 
00487 #endif
00488 
00489     AKSIMD_V4F32 vTmp1 = AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_V4F32( vCIn1, vCIn1, AKSIMD_SHUFFLE(2,2,0,0)); 
00490     vTmp1 = AKSIMD_MUL_V4F32( vTmp1, vCIn2 );
00491     AKSIMD_V4F32 vTmp2 = AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_V4F32( vCIn1, vCIn1, AKSIMD_SHUFFLE(3,3,1,1)); 
00492     vTmp2 = AKSIMD_MUL_V4F32( vTmp2, vSign );
00493     vTmp2 = AKSIMD_MUL_V4F32( vTmp2, vCIn2 );
00494     vTmp2 = AKSIMD_SHUFFLE_BADC( vTmp2 ); 
00495     vTmp2 = AKSIMD_ADD_V4F32( vTmp2, vTmp1 );
00496     return vTmp2;
00497 }
00498 
00499 #endif

00511 #define AKSIMD_UNPACKLO_VECTOR8I16( __a__, __b__ ) vreinterpretq_s32_s16( vzipq_s16( vreinterpretq_s16_s32(__a__), vreinterpretq_s16_s32(__b__) ).val[0] )
00512 
00515 #define AKSIMD_UNPACKHI_VECTOR8I16( __a__, __b__ ) vreinterpretq_s32_s16( vzipq_s16( vreinterpretq_s16_s32(__a__), vreinterpretq_s16_s32(__b__) ).val[1] )
00516 
00519 AkForceInline AKSIMD_V4F32 AKSIMD_UNPACKLO_V4F32( const AKSIMD_V4F32& in_vec1, const AKSIMD_V4F32& in_vec2 )
00520 {
00521     // sce_vectormath_xayb(in_vec1, in_vec2)
00522     float32x2_t xy = vget_low_f32( in_vec1 /*xyzw*/ );
00523     float32x2_t ab = vget_low_f32( in_vec2 /*abcd*/ );
00524     float32x2x2_t xa_yb = vtrn_f32( xy, ab );
00525     AKSIMD_V4F32 xayb = vcombine_f32( xa_yb.val[0], xa_yb.val[1] );
00526     return xayb;
00527 }
00528 
00531 AkForceInline AKSIMD_V4F32 AKSIMD_UNPACKHI_V4F32( const AKSIMD_V4F32& in_vec1, const AKSIMD_V4F32& in_vec2 )
00532 {
00533     //return sce_vectormath_zcwd( in_vec1, in_vec2 );
00534     float32x2_t zw = vget_high_f32( in_vec1 /*xyzw*/ );
00535     float32x2_t cd = vget_high_f32( in_vec2 /*abcd*/ );
00536     float32x2x2_t zc_wd = vtrn_f32( zw, cd );
00537     AKSIMD_V4F32 zcwd = vcombine_f32( zc_wd.val[0], zc_wd.val[1] );
00538     return zcwd;
00539 }
00540 
00543 AkForceInline AKSIMD_V4I32 AKSIMD_PACKS_V4I32( const AKSIMD_V4I32& in_vec1, const AKSIMD_V4I32& in_vec2 )
00544 {
00545     int16x4_t   vec1_16 = vqmovn_s32( in_vec1 );
00546     int16x4_t   vec2_16 = vqmovn_s32( in_vec2 );
00547     int16x8_t result = vcombine_s16( vec1_16, vec2_16 );
00548     return vreinterpretq_s32_s16( result );
00549 }

00589 // (cond1 >= cond2) ? b : a.
00590 #define AKSIMD_SEL_GTEQ_V4F32( __a__, __b__, __cond1__, __cond2__ ) AKSIMD_VSEL_V4F32( __a__, __b__, AKSIMD_GTEQ_V4F32( __cond1__, __cond2__ ) )
00591 
00592 // a >= 0 ? b : c ... Written, like, you know, the normal C++ operator syntax.
00593 #define AKSIMD_SEL_GTEZ_V4F32( __a__, __b__, __c__ ) AKSIMD_VSEL_V4F32( (__c__), (__b__), AKSIMD_GTEQ_V4F32( __a__, AKSIMD_SETZERO_V4F32() ) )
